experience.title: Data Analyst
experience.description: Procured technical lead position for Harmonized System of Nomenclature module and headed a group of 3 internsScrapped the HSN information from customs tariff websites of various countries by taking the help of Web-Harvey Formulated, cleaned and restructured the Harmonic System of Nomenclature dataset utilizing Excel and PythonDevised an ML algorithm to find the nearest sea port close to a given area utilizing the Haversine Distance Formu
experience.description_html: Procured technical lead position for Harmonized System of Nomenclature module and headed a group of 3 internsScrapped the HSN information from customs tariff websites of various countries by taking the help of Web-Harvey Formulated, cleaned and restructured the Harmonic System of Nomenclature dataset utilizing Excel and PythonDevised an ML algorithm to find the nearest sea port close to a given area utilizing the Haversine Distance Formu <!---->

education.title: New English High School & Jr. College

projects: [{"title":"Numerical Study on Flame Acoustic Interactions","start_date":"Aug 2022","end_date":"May 2023","description":"• Prepared a 2D model of the flow through the injector of a liquid rocket engine combustion motor via ANSYS FLUENT Geometry to basically study about the combustion instabilities inside a combustion chamber• Analyzed the non premixed case of Hydrogen Oxygen fuel-oxidizer combination using the simulations for both the cold flow and reacting flow.• Added pressure fluctuations at the side walls of the domain to simulate the effect of transverse waves produced during the operation of a Liquid Rocket Engine.• Coupled the pressure fluctuations with the Hydrogen Oxygen flame to visualize the Flame-Acoustic interactions.• For better visualizations of the Flame-Acoustic Interactions post-processed the results of the simulations to get a numerical schileren image of the results."},{"title":"Flow Field Study on Effect of Tip Clearance for Tandem Bladed Axial Flow Compressor","start_date":"Dec 2021","end_date":"Apr 2022","description":"• Prepared and analysed a 3-dimensional mesh of the given blade dimensions using the Turbogrid ANSYS 2019 R2 version• Performed a detailed computational study on the flow around the tip region of the blade by changing the clearance values• Explored the effect on flow parameters of tip clearance flow on the blades of tandem bladed axial flow compressors in detail"},{"title":"Aerodynamics and Power Generation of a Kite","start_date":"Jan 2021","end_date":"Apr 2021","description":"Observed the variation of lift and drag profiles of four types of kites for a particular set of velocities and altitudesCalculated the power generated through each of the four kites following the keen observation and filtering of the dataOptimised the calculated power to be approximately 100 W, enough to power electronic devices such as mobiles, laptops, etc"},{"title":"Aerodynamic Shape Optimisation of Hyperloop Pod to Minimize Drag","start_date":"Jun 2020","end_date":"Nov 2020","description":"Optimised the exterior shape of the pod subjecting to minimise the drag on the Hyperloop Pod using SU2 shape optimisationDecreased the total length of the pod along with sharpening the nose of the hyperloop pod to achieve higher speedsReduced the drag force on the pod by 15 percent compared to the previously taken readings of the original base model"}]
